Brighthearth Banneret's ability reduces the casting cost of Elemental spells and Warrior spells by ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol). That includes alternate costs (e.g. Elemental creatures with Evoke), however it does not reduce costs for activated abilities of anything.

posts.post_content: A very good card especially if you've picked up the Element Thunder Planechase pack or have made a warrior deck. This guy makes everything you cast in both cheaper in one and working in tandem with Smokebraider in the Elemental side, you can start playing your big hitters much faster.
